zlibrary

Class ZContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • zlibrary.ZComponent
      • zlibrary.ZImage
        • zlibrary.ZContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ZDrawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArenaEntranceViewer, CharacterCreationViewer, CharacterStatisticsViewer, CombatViewer, CreditsViewer, EndSceneViewer, HighScoreViewer, LoadGameViewer, MainMenuViewer, QuestLogViewer, TownViewer, WorldMapViewer

    public abstract class ZContainer
extends ZImage
implements ZDrawable
    Abstract class for creating containers for Z-objects. Contains a component list and an entity list to self keep track of its sub-components.
    Since:
    2015-02-27
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mattias Benngard

      void remove()
      Called when removing this container from Game.removeContainer(ZContainer z)
      void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Calls render for the background ZImage of the container as well as calling render for all the Z-objects that the container holds.

        public ZContainer(java.awt.Image image,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  EventAdder eventAdder,
                  java.util.List<ZEntity> entities)
        Constructor for ZContainer
        Parameters:
        image - - which image to be drawn as the background of the container
        x - - where it is placed in x
        y - - where it is placed in y
        eventAdder - - to what event queue it should be adding
        entities - - a reference to all existing entities
